block.name: send_mail

input.body:
Hi #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"foreach","line":"a220cd37","path":["638bf4fa_3ebf_4aee_9752_a26b34ec5e05"]}')} (#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"foreach","line":"a220cd37","path":["5ad936b7_465f_4332_b008_0e58b959acb0"]}')}),

The amount for Request #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"5e994ef4","path":["parameters","CMASP_Number"]}')} - #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"5e994ef4","path":["parameters","Request_Type"]}')} for Plant #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"5e994ef4","path":["parameters","Plant_Number"]}')} and Storage Location #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"5e994ef4","path":["parameters","Storage_Location"]}')} is $#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"foreach","line":"a220cd37","path":["4f1ff91a_8fb1_47bd_a2a7_a5c88e5b7daa"]}')}.
input.subject: #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"5e994ef4","path":["parameters","CMASP_Number"]}')} - #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"5e994ef4","path":["parameters","Request_Type"]}')} - Amount Exceeds $2500

block.comment: if US $ Amount is > $2,500 an email notification should be snet to Vendor Email address, PEWO User, and Site Leader

input.Subject: #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"5e994ef4","path":["parameters","CMASP_Number"]}')} - #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"5e994ef4","path":["parameters","Request_Type"]}')} - Amount Exceeds $2500.
input.Content:
Hi 
#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"foreach","line":"a220cd37","path":["638bf4fa_3ebf_4aee_9752_a26b34ec5e05"]}')}(#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"foreach","line":"a220cd37","path":["5ad936b7_465f_4332_b008_0e58b959acb0"]}')}),

The amount for Request CMASP number #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"5e994ef4","path":["parameters","CMASP_Number"]}')}-  Request type#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"5e994ef4","path":["parameters","Request_Type"]}')} for Plant #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"5e994ef4","path":["parameters","Plant_Number"]}')} and Storage Location #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"5e994ef4","path":["parameters","Storage_Location"]}')} is $ #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"foreach","line":"a220cd37","path":["4f1ff91a_8fb1_47bd_a2a7_a5c88e5b7daa"]}')}.
